sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; function ObituaryForm () { const [ values, setValues ] = useState( { fname: '', lname: '', dob: '', dod: '', country: '', city: '', religion: '', images: null, certificates: null, title: '', donation: '', description: '', name: '', email: '', contactNo: '', nic: '' } ); const handleSubmit = ( e ) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); Object.entries( values ).forEach( ( [ key, value ] ) => { formData.append( key, value ); } ); axios.post( 'http://localhost:8081/obituary', values ) .then( res => console.log( res ) ) .catch( err => console.log( err ) ); } return (

CREATE YOUR OBITUARY ....

{/* for personal information */ }

Person's Information

setValues( { ...values, fname: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, lname: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, dob: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, dod: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, country: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, city: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, images: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, certificates: e.target.value } ) } />
{/* for more information */ }

More Information

setValues( { ...values, title: e.target.value } ) } />
{/* for user information */ }

Your Contact Details

setValues( { ...values, name: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, email: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, contactNo: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, nic: e.target.value } ) } />
) } export default ObituaryForm
